modName: MRN - Mark Recall and Teleport NPCs
summary: For marking an NPC and recalling them later.
descriptionHtml:
This is a very early prototype.  Use at your own risk.

This beta mod adds two spells to the player:

M.R.N. Mark (Alteration) - Fire this at an NPC to \"mark\" them.

M.R.N. Recall And Teleport (Conjuration) - Use this to recall or summon marked NPCs to the player, or to send them home.


Issues:

- Moving certain quest-dependant NPCs may seriously mess up certain quests or your game.
- Only 1 NPC may be marked at a time.  Future releases will allow for multiple NPCs (10 or more).
- Any NPC can be marked.  Future releases will have a certain limiters, like disallowing NPCs that are hostile towards the player.
- NPC can only be summoned to the player or sent home.  Future releases will allow the player to mark and send NPCs to a home base.
- Marking a 2nd NPC does not send the previous NPC home.
- Magic visuals are pretty bare at the moment.
- Trying to recall a marked NPC that has been removed from the game (through quest completion or something) may summon an invisible NPC that is good for nothing.
- Others??? Please report bugs.

Comments extremely welcomed!!
author: gigantibyte
